p: Hydrodistillation was performed in the hydrodistillation system. The hydrolate was prepared as follows: the appropriate amount of plant material was weighed into a 2000 mL distillation flask, 500 mL of deionized water was added (water was replenished during the distillation) and the distillation was started. The hydrolate was collected as described in Section 3.1.1. The final sample of hydrolate was obtained by mixing the hydrolates from three distillation runs.
